channel.title: I need a suggestion for an old-school remake
channel.description:
Looking for something that's 04-06 inspired. The first rs2 interface server preferred that's as close a replicant as any with a decently active community?
Are there any out there that anyone would recommend?

item.title: I need a suggestion for an old-school remake
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

Mine is 2005 based, click the link in my signature. It’s not out yet though.

Read full topic
